results.name: Structured triakis tetrahedral numbers (vertex structure 4).
comment: Equals binomial transform of [1, 7, 15, 9, 0, 0, 0,...] where (1, 7, 15, 9) = row 3 of triangle A038763. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 19 2008
Equals convolution square of 1, 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, 19,..., A016777. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 28 2009
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-6,4,-1).
xref: Cf. A000578 = alternate vertex; A100145 for more on structured numbers.
results.author: James A. Record (james.record(AT)gmail.com), Nov 07 2004
